title: Embedded Support Device (ESD)-Enhanced Learning Material Design for Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital learning tools and foundational understanding of social studies
context.additional_context: A social sector job competency enhancement program for working professionals, delivering blended classes using digital devices and an LMS (Learning Management System)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts by over 80% through analyzing learning materials utilizing ESD (Embedded Support Devices)
Learners can select and apply ESD types (feedback questions, learning guides, etc.) tailored to their prior knowledge levels and attitudes
Learners can directly design ESD-integrated learning materials and conduct peer evaluations at least three times through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
